ds.made.jdbc.easy.utility

Class OracleParameterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ds.made.jdbc.easy.utility.OracleParameterFactory

  • public class OracleParameterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Simplified creation of Oracle database parameters. Port from oracle.jdbc.OracleTypes.
    Author:
    ds
